// Pivot 0, 0
int flipperleft[18] = {
	14, 37,
	20, 47,
	92, 76,
	99, 77,
	104, 71,
	104, 62,
	34, 23,
	23, 23,
	16, 29
};

// Pivot 0.000000, 0.000000
float flipperleft[18] = {
	0.116667f, 0.370000f,
	0.166667f, 0.470000f,
	0.766667f, 0.760000f,
	0.825000f, 0.770000f,
	0.866667f, 0.710000f,
	0.866667f, 0.620000f,
	0.283333f, 0.230000f,
	0.191667f, 0.230000f,
	0.133333f, 0.290000f
};
